title: Connecting classroom learning to lived experience
description: Connecting classroom learning to lived experience
content:
Scenario: Connecting classroom learning to lived experience
    Given Kenji learns economic theory in classes
    And he lives care economy reality daily in his household
    When the educational_elohim bridges theory and practice
    Then it should help Kenji see connections between academic concepts and daily life
    And it should validate his experiential knowledge as real learning
    And it should show how his household management applies economic principles
    And lived experience should be recognized as legitimate knowledge source
    And the system should integrate academic and experiential learning
    And Kenji's practical care economy work should inform his academic understanding
